result.reason: VNCProxyPassword and RDGatewayPassword are serialized unconditionally (lines 187, 196) bypassing SaveFilter.SavePassword, while also the main Password field exports plaintext without any warning UI when exporting to CSV.
result.approach: Wrap VNCProxyPassword and RDGatewayPassword writes with _saveFilter.SavePassword check; add a security warning dialog in FrmExport when CSV format is selected and SavePassword is enabled, informing the user passwords will be stored in plaintext.
